special_text:
[+2]: Exile the top two cards of your library. You may put a permanent card from among them into your hand.
[-3]: Create Salim, a legendary 3/3 green and white Cat creature token with vigilance, trample, and indestructible.
[-3]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature you control enters, that creature gets +2/+2 and gains haste until end of turn.”
